front.title: DHCP Options for Configuring Multicast Addresses in VXLAN

abstract.t: This document defines DHCPv4 and DHCPv6 options for assigning multicast addresses for the Tunnel End Point in the Virtual eXtensible Local Area Network (VXLAN) environments. New DHCP options are defined which allow a VXLAN Tunnel End Point to request any source multicast address for the newly created virtual machine and possibly IPv4/IPv6 address(es) for the virtual machine.
